snippet: A 13-year-old boy appears to have deliberately shot and killed a 12-year-old girl outside a foster home in rural southwest Missouri, Sheriff Randee Kaiser of Jasper County said Friday.
abstract: Police say 13-year-old boy appears to have deliberately shot and killed 12-year-old Teresa J Potts outside foster home in rural Missouri.
lead_paragraph: A 13-year-old boy appears to have deliberately shot and killed a 12-year-old girl outside a foster home in rural southwest Missouri, Sheriff Randee Kaiser of Jasper County said Friday.

headline.main: Missouri: Boy, 13, Held in Shooting Death of Girl, 12
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Boy, 13, Held in Shooting Death of Girl, 12
